channel.title: Help me please.... really badly need it!
channel.description:
Okay so, i have spent about 4 hours looking for a solution on several different websites and forums. I have yet to find one to my problem. My problem being that when i switch to lunar magics and then click my spell book tab my client freezes and this is the error that shows up:
[url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3867591/Untitled.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3867591/Untitled.png[/img][/url]
Also, further info yes this is a PI client and source base help would be much appreciated thanks guys.

Can anyone help me… in desperate need

item.title: Help me please.... really badly need it!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:539640”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=658480.msg4404619#msg4404619 date=1391536476]
The interface ID isn’t being found I think, perhaps try adding it to the cache.
[/quote]
this is what I was thinking, pretty sure you’re trying to use an interface that doesn’t exist[/quote]

That’s what a NullpointerExeption is.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please.... really badly need it!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Actionhandler class:
Look for case 410:
Should look something like that: case 410: if(c.playerMagicBook == 0 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 1) { //your code here break;

Add / edit: c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);

Read full topic

item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“koda0967, post:1, topic:539640”]Okay so, i have spent about 4 hours looking for a solution on several different websites and forums. I have yet to find one to my problem. My problem being that when i switch to lunar magics and then click my spell book tab my client freezes and this is the error that shows up:

Also, further info yes this is a PI client and source base help would be much appreciated thanks guys.[/quote]
That’s normal, you can’t prevent it due the client is causing this. Try using another sidebar interface, i think the single code looks like ‘c.setSidebarInterface(xxx);’, Change your current one to this: wait let me search im on @ phone sec
